features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Users can sign up, log in, and log out.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to create an account so I can access the platform.
As a user, I want to log in to my account securely.

features.name: Project Dashboard
features.description: Users can view a list of their projects.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to see all my projects in one place.

features.name: Billing Management
features.description: Users can view their subscription and payment history.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to check my current billing plan.

features.name: Profile Settings
features.description: Users can update their personal information.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to change my password.
